doc.title: Scrollport

value.content: The scrollport is the visual viewport of a scroll container in a document. A scroll container is created by applying overflow: scroll to a container, or overflow: auto when there is enough content to cause overflow. The scrollport coincides with the padding box of that container and represents the content that can be seen as the box is scrolled.
